text: Hedley Brian Taber was born 29 April, 1940 in Wagga Wagga and died on 21 July, 2023 in Bayview. He was an Australian cricketer who played 16 test matches for Australia from 1966 to 1970. He also played for New South Wales in the Sheffield Shield. After his retirement, he went into coaching field and was also a part of the selection committee of South wales team. ==References== ==Other websites== * Brian Taber at ESPNcricinfo Category:1940 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Australian cricketers Category:People from Wagga Wagga
title: Brian Taber
